about.title: About Us
about.body: At Souq Al-Ghaith, we aim to create an interactive space that strengthens social solidarity, especially in challenging times. We build bridges of support and communication, where everyone can be part of the solution and contribute in multiple ways. We believe that what you own, no matter how simple, may be valuable to someone else. At the same time, you may find what you need from others here, reducing financial pressure and promoting a spirit of sharing and giving. We offer you the opportunity to exchange, sell, or donate your extra items to support your community and strengthen social bonds.
about.exchange: Exchange: swap what you have for what you need, without money.
about.sale: Sell: offer what you have at an affordable price that helps you earn some income and eases the burden on others.
about.donate: Donate: give to those in need, reflecting generosity and supporting community cohesion.
about.closing: Together, we build solidarity, create hope, and work towards a better future for all.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.desc: A long established fact that readable content will distract the reader.
faq.q1: What is the idea of Souq Al-Ghaith?
faq.a1: Souq Al-Ghaith is a platform that allows you to exchange, sell, or donate items you no longer need to help others in a supportive way.
faq.q2: How can I exchange through the website?
faq.a2: You can submit the items you want to exchange by adding a clear description and then follow exchange requests.
faq.q3: Can I sell my products on the website?
faq.a3: Yes, you can sell your products at an affordable price and list them easily on the platform.
faq.q4: How do I ensure the safety of received items?
faq.a4: Each listed item can be reviewed by the team to help ensure quality and safety.
faq.q5: Are there any fees to use the website?
faq.a5: No, the platform is completely free with no fees for exchanging or selling.
faq.a6: Simply choose the items you want to exchange and contact the owner to arrange the exchange.
